definitions.title: n.pr.mont.
definitions.body: Lebanon (Ph. [[לבנן]]; As. Labnanu, etc., Schr:COT on 1Ki 5:13, Dl:Par. 103 ff.; Egypt. Ra-mª n-n WMM

definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: :Asian u. Europa, 197ff.; Ar. lubna0nun cf. further Rob:BR ii, 435ff. 493 GASm:Geogr.45ff. Buhl:Geogr.110 and reff.; name prob. fr. whiteness ~f its cliffs Rob:BR ii, 493);—wooded mountain-range on northern border of Isr. [usu. c. art. ´[[הַלּ]] (51 t.); without art. [[לְבָנוֹן]], poet. and late Ho 14:8, Na 1:4, 2Ki 19:23 = Is 37:24, Ez Eze 31:15, Eze 31:16, Is 14:8, Is 29:17, Is 33:9, Is 40:16, Je 18:14, Hb Hab 2:17, Zec 10:10, Zec 11:1, Ps 29:6, Ct So 4:8, So 4:8, So 4:11, So 4:15 ; c. [[ה]] loc. [[לְבָב֫וֹנׇה]] 1Ki 5:28]; perh. first mentioned in defining a locality, as [[הַר הַלְּבָנוֹן]], Ju Jdg 3:3 (E acc. to GFM; this combination only here), but also in early proph., then in D, and later;—in defining a locality Jos 9:1; ´[[בִּקְעַת הַלּ]] Jos 11:17, Jos 12:7 (side of Baal Gad); as a marked feature, in describing extent of land De 1:7, De 3:25, De 11:24, Jos 1:4, Jos 13:5 ([[כָּל־הַל]]) v:Jos 13:6 (all D), 1Ki 9:19 = 2Ch 8:6, Je 22:26, Zec 10:10; ´[[אשׁהַל]]´[[ר]] Je 22:6 (fig. of royal house of Judah), as a height Ct So 4:8, So 4:8; ´[[מִגְדַּל הַל]] Ct So 7:5 i.e. a tower built on Lebanon; ´[[שֶׁלֶג ל]] Je 18:14 snow of L.; L. as source of streams Ct So 4:15; ´[[יֵיֵן ל]] Ho 14:8; most often, however, as bearing forests, esp. of cedars, ´[[אַרְזֵי הַלּ]] Ju Jdg 9:15 (in allegory; perh. J, acc. to GFM), Is 2:13, Is 14:8, Ps 29:5, Ps 104:16, cf. 1Ki 5:13, 1Ki 5:20, 1Ki 5:23, 1Ki 5:28, 1Ki 5:28, 2Ch 2:7, 2Ch 2:7, 2Ch 2:15, 2Ki 14:9, 2Ki 14:9 = 2Ch 25:18, 2Ch 25:18 (in allegory), Je 22:23, Ez Eze 17:3, Eze 27:5, Eze 31:3, Eze 31:15, Eze 31:16, Zec 11:1, Ezr 3:7, Ps 92:13, Ct So 3:9, So 5:15 (sim. of majestic figure); ´[[פֶּרַח ל]] Na 1:4; ´[[כְּבוֹד הַלּ]] Is 35:2, Is 60:13; [[לְכַרְמֶל]] ´[[וְשָׁב ל]] Is 29:17 (‖[[יַעַר ]]) ´[[יַרְכְּתֵי ל]] with the same ref. Is 37:24 = 2Ki 19:23; ´[[הַלּ]] = trees of Lebanon Ho 14:6, Is Is 10:34, Is 40:16, Ps 29:6, Ps 72:16; ´[[ל]] Is Is 33:9 fig., as mourning; ´[[חֲמַס ל]] Hb Hab 2:17 i.e. violence done to Lebanon, prob. by cutting down its trees; ´[[בֵּית יַעַר הַלּ]] a royal mansion of Sol., 1Ki 7:2 and 1Ki 10:17, 1Ki 10:21 = 2Ch 9:16, 2Ch 9:20; ´[[ל]] as home of wild beast 2Ki 14:9 = 2Ch 25:18 (in allegory); [[רֵיחַ לְבָנוֹן]], of the odour of cedar forests Ct So 4:11, cf. Ho 14:7 (in sim.; We thinks ´[[ל]] here to be a specific plant).
